title: Web Font equivalent to Vialog
content:
Does anyone know which web font would be the closest to Vialog in terms of appearance?

 [‹ Toastmasters font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053305/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45284 "Go to previous forum topic") [1980s fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011053305/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45265 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
Thanks james for confirming.
